Scene:
The Gojo Bridge
(Gojōbashi / 五条橋)

Play: Kumagai at the Fan Shop (須磨都源平躑躅)

Production: May 1976

– Click image to view.



Narrators (Tayu):

Takemoto Takatayū (竹本貴大夫)



Shamisen Players:
